The BLE devices are based on Nordic series

abstrac: electrical engineering, web development, Internet of Things, PCB design, firmware programming, mobile app
bio:
I am a senior electrical engineer with 10 years of experience in PCB layout and firmware design for more than 50 products. I have been designing custom PCB layouts and firmware programming by myself as is required for customers and have achieved several market-ready products.
I have rich experience in developing the IoT solutions, biometric devices, power supplies, high-speed DSP devices, and PLC devices.
I also provide the service of web development and mobile app development.
We can discuss the project over phone, skype, slack, and email.
My hourly rate is $50/hr. I can work in full-time.

bio:
CONGRATULATIONS -- I assume that you are here because you are in search of a fastidious creative writer with a powerful thrust. If my assumption is right, then you can rest assured that you are at the right place. In six years, I have written a lot of fiction stories, for my personal use and some others for friends. My inspirations include Nora Roberts, Sandra Brown, Anne Rice, Emmanuelle Arsan, and Danielle Steel. I want to help you breathe life into your characters, bring them to life, and make them as real as they could be. I have experience in writing Dark Romance, Mafia, Young Adult, Romantic Comedy, Chicklit, Contemporary, Alpha Male, Alpha Females, Urban, Billionaire, and Bad Boy Genres, but I can also write on several other genres like Werewolves, Sci-Fi, Christian, Adventure, and Paranormal. I am open to writing on other genres, and I ensure that I do my research methodically before putting my knowledge into words.

In Fiction, I am most active in the romance genres, I can write a fully fleshed out romance/erotica short story in less than a week (depending on the word count) and will put 110% effort into making a story that fits whatever you desire! I've written in countless genres and themes over the years, and it's safe to say that romance and adventure are the ones I'm the best at. I can also write other fiction stories like BBW, paranormal, gay/straight, BDSM, time travel, interracial, and others.

My services include
-writing with or without an outline
-a story with a unique and captivating writing style
-a complete proofread for spelling, grammar, and any syntax errors
-writing using any specifics you request
- Plagiarism free work

I am completely open-minded about any topics or details you wish to be added to your story and am always eager to help bring a new story to life, maybe you'll even surprise me! I love hearing about new ideas and concepts and putting them into words, so don't hesitate to tell me exactly what you want and what's on your mind

Email communication preferred for most gigs...
Available anytime
No Skype, sorry.

abstrac: I am here to help you achieve your goals and solve your tasks using the best of my knowledge, capabilities, and world-class expertise in WordPress.
bio:
Hi 👋 I'm Shahzaib, I have been working on WordPress for more than 5 years and have delivered 400+ websites with High-quality Design, SEO friendly, Extreme Performance, and targeted to generate business leads.

I work with WordPress & Elementor every day and am fully up to date with the latest in functionality, responsiveness, and design trends. I am fully experienced in all aspects of website design using WordPress and can also advise on SEO best practices and website optimization. I also have skills in PHP, CSS3, and html5 which I use to customize WordPress sites.

I am highly motivated, creative, versatile, and especially skilled in creating and directing corporate and new business designs. Exceptional interpersonal skills and accomplished at incorporating the desires of the client with a superior design solution. I assure clients and companies that demand high-quality design to further business goals and professional image are most welcome to have excellent and outstanding services.

abstrac: I love helping companies tell their stories.
bio:
I am currently consulting as a Copy Editor. In this role I work remotely interviewing clients, writing case studies, and sometimes articles, about their experiences, which are then published on the company's website as a marketing tool. 

Previously I worked in all aspects of digital video and audio production, both live and pre-recorded, and content management. My favorite experiences include producing a gameshow for my company's booth at CES, producing an informative yet highly entertaining messaging video (also for CES), and traveling around the nation for various trade shows. I also really enjoyed writing a weekly music news show because it allowed my humor to come through. Creative collaborative environments are where I thrive and have had the most successful experiences. I love people, the creative process, and bringing ideas to fruition. Ultimately my most enduring skills are writing and creative vision, because they are what come naturally to me, although I have always learned many unexpected skills (Camera operation! Editing video! Producing video!) in each career experience, often on the fly and under pressure. I relate more to Ted Lasso and Andrea Sachs, than Rebecca Welton and Miranda Priestly. 

Specialties: creative storytelling, audio production, audio programming, digital broadcast, creative concept and development, radio, copy writing, directing, copy editing, audio engineering, script writing, story boarding, pre-production, production, post production, multi-platform, internet marketing, integrated online strategies, digital publishing, metrics, sound design, content management, project management, social media, corporate communications, graphics, layout, design, video editing, advanced media

bio:
Competent design engineer with a successful track record of providing PIPING design engineering services and Mechanical design, across industries over 20 years as a full-time employee & freelancer, in the area of Water, Air, Gas, Acid, Steam, Fume, Hydraulic, Grease, Oil, and Melting-Casting, in the German MNC, Austrian MNC, Italian MNC, and Japanese MNC.

- Accomplished more than 12 nos. of projects of piping, from the Basic Engineering to Bill of Materials with Procurement specifications / Manufacturing instructions, using the CAD design applications and the standard codes ANSI, DIN, ISO, JIS, and the IS norm in the area of Melt shop & Furnaces, Bloom Caster, Billet Caster, Slab Caster, Hot Strip Mill, Bar & Wire Rod Mill, Sheet Processing Line, etc.

- Deputed to Italy four times, for the Basic design engineering work of piping, in an average duration of three months for each.

- Trained in Germany for three months, on the International Standard Design Drawing & Engineering practices along with the CADD applications.

Services:
 
-   PFD and P&ID Development

-   Piping Class & Equipment Selection

-   Layout & General Arrangement

-   Detail Engineering & Bill of Materials
 
-   Piping Isometric & 3D Modeling

-   3D Modeling of Equipment

-   Solid Modeling of Machine and Castings

-   Plumbing Design Drawings

-   CAD Customization & Programming

-   Technical Writings

Other Associates:
Civil-Structural, Mechanical, Electrical-Automation, HVAC & Fire Fighting.

Company Served:
SMS SIEMAG, SIEMENS VAI, DANIELI, STEEL PLANTECH, UNISEVEN, SIEMENS, DUNLOP, NALCO, QUOTIENT ENGG, STEWARTS & LLOYDS, OTTO, ICI, CESC, IFB, etc.

- Post Graduate Diploma in Piping Design & Engineering.
- Diploma in Mechanical Engineering.

- Computer Skills AutoCAD 2D, 3D, Solid Modeling, Customization & AutoLISP Programming; MS-Office, Adobe Acrobat, Email & Internet; C, C++, C# and the LISP; DOS, Windows, and the Linux.

~ For the Details of my Experiences kindly refer to Portfolio ~

Hours of operation – Normally works from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM IST, 5 days week, and keeping provision for extra hours of work to meet the deadline.

Preferred hourly basis job in case of analysis dependent work and preferred fixed priced job in case of the complete ready input.
 
Payment terms – Payments through SafePay, protected by Guru.com.

Preferred communication – Email, Chat, Phone, and Video Calling.

bio:
If you’ve reached my page, you’re looking for great written content at affordable prices. You’re looking for someone who knows how to get you more leads, more reviews and more customers.

Maybe you’re new to the industry, or maybe you’re old-hat. Either way, you’re looking for content that will catch your reader’s attention and then hold it.

Whatever your specific situation is, you’re investing a lot of money and time into your vision. You don’t want to write the content yourself- and it’s pretty tough to hire a writer who knows how to get you more customers.

You don’t want just any writer on the job. You want a professional.


That’s where I come in. Hi, I’m Noemi Contreras.

I’ve made it my business to know everything there is to know about writing content that sells.

From the sales pitch to the content itself, I’ve got you covered. I’ve been in this business for 5 years now and have recently made the switch to writing on the Upwork platform.

Not only am I an expert on content creation, but I have studied in the fields of Psychology, Public Relations, Human Resources, Marketing and Effective Communication.

What does this mean? It means that I understand people. I understand your customers. I know what makes them tick and I know how to keep them coming back for more.

Are you interested yet?

If so, here’s what I want you to do next:

You’re looking for great, affordable content from a professional. The next step is to message me so that we can start the conversation about your project.

Don’t worry- there’s no obligation to hire me. I won’t get pushy! The goal is to find out if we’re a good fit.

If we’re not a good fit, no problem and no hard feelings. However, if we are a good fit, you can look forward to receiving great content at competitive prices- content that will increase your sales and customer base.

Sound good? To get the conversation started, hit the green “Hire Me” button on the top right of this page.

P.S. Thanks for sticking with me for this
We can set that up according to your project.No Skype
